name: Ambulance Duty Simulator 2017-Rescue Driving 3D
description:
Ambulance Duty Simulator 2017-Rescue Driving 3D

Ambulance duty simulator 3D is one of the best game among ambulance simulation games. It’s full of actions that you need to take on emergency calls for taking patients from emergency spot to hospital in minimum time.
Being a part of devoted ambulance team you need to rush to the aid as you are responsible for saving precious lives. In this ambulance duty rescue simulator game you have been given the role of a skilled ambulance driver, keep in mind that seconds count as you make your way through the traffic in the realistic 3D city. Transport the seriously injured people to the hospital to save their lives, make sure your selected route across the huge city must be the shortest and fastest possible one. Your ambulance driving abilities will be put to the trial. As you need to avoid vehicles on your way to the hospital. Turn your ambulance sirens on to clears the roads from cars, buses and other traffic vehicles. Have you any skills that prove you to be a real ambulance driver, precious lives are in your hands. Lives are at risk so drive with precision and be quick. You will have to be a little bit crazy driver to drive between these massive cars around the city as you are racing to the right destination.
Your duty is to pick up the injured people from emergency and accidental spots and take them to the nearest hospital for medical treatment. You need to park the ambulance at parking area to for quick rescue.
--- Features of Ambulance Rescue Simulator 3D ---
• It’s absolutely FREE on ios app store !
• Lots of Challenging Missions
• 3D city environment with realistic graphics
• Explore the beautiful open world
• Realistic Ambulance driving physics
• Smooth controls and fun gameplay
• Realistic intelligent traffic
• Experience the smooth gameplay of this free driving simulator game
• Detailed 3D HD graphics optimized to run smooth on your mobile phone or tablet device
• iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices.

This is the game you have been waiting for to help the injured people! So… Download it now and help the people by saving their lives.

We hope you will like our Ambulance Rescue simulator game and don’t forget to rate us on iTune Store! Thanks
